name: conchord-ui
description: A UI for the conchord file format

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules bower_components app.js server-output output
scripts.build: pulp browserify -t app.js -I src --src-path client && pulp build -o server-output --src-path server -I src
scripts.dev-server: pulp -w --then "node index" build -o server-output --src-path server -I src
scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && git add app.js -f && git add server-output -f && git commit -m'release' && git push heroku HEAD:master -f && git reset --hard HEAD^

author: Yannick Dominguez
